participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing with a strong focus on her students' well-being.
participant_1.background: I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee! I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids. I studied business as my major. I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and competitive, with a keen awareness of his surroundings.
participant_2.background: I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me. I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. I hate Mexican food. During the week, I work as a barista. I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.

content.text: What's up? I'm about to go to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
Hello! That's awesome, I love iced coffee. I work as a barista during the week, but I'm trying to get in shape so I'm cutting out sugary drinks.
Oh, that's good! I'm a teacher and I love my job, but I often neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
That's really admirable. I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. I'm in good shape and my weight is healthy, but I'm just not sure if I have what it takes to win.
I'm sure you do! You sound like you're in great shape. I used to run marathons, but I had to stop because I have a disability.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you were great at it!
Thanks. I try to stay positive, and I'm really excited about my new iced coffee maker!
That's great! I hope you have a great day at work!
